text: Ceroplesis rubrocincta is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Hintz in 1911. It is known from Kenya, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, and Tanzania.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis rubrocincta. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1911
title: Ceroplesis rubrocincta
